item.title: [562] Spirit Shield [562]
item.dc:creator: @teh0wn_ltd teh0wn ltd
item.description:
@teh0wn_ltd wrote:

Hello, This is my first tut on mopar so im kinda nervous.
This tut is for rs2hd but if there are any other bases besides rs2hd then this should still work but i only tested on this base so bare with me.
Now the files we will be editing will be one and ONLY one so i will rate this 0.000001/100.
Now, goto Your Source\src\com\rs2hd\packethandler and look for ItemPacketHandler
Open it then look for if (UseWith(2368,2366,usedWith,itemUsed)) { player.getSmithing().DragonSquaresmithing(player); } and under that add this

//Arcane if (UseWith(13736,13746,usedWith,itemUsed)) { if (!player.getInventory().contains(2347)){ player.sm("You need a hammer for make an Spirit Shield."); return; } player.sm("You made a Arcane Spirit Shield."); player.getSkills().addXp(13, 50000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(usedWith, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemUsed, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(13738, 1); } //Divine if (UseWith(13736,13748,usedWith,itemUsed)) { if (!player.getInventory().contains(2347)){ player.sm("You need a hammer for make any Spirit Shield."); return; } player.sm("You made a Divine Spirit Shield."); player.getSkills().addXp(13, 50000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(usedWith, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemUsed, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(13740, 1); } //Elysian if (UseWith(13736,13750,usedWith,itemUsed)) { if (!player.getInventory().contains(2347)){ player.sm("You need a hammer for make any Spirit Shield."); return; } player.sm("You made a Elysian Spirit Shield."); player.getSkills().addXp(13, 50000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(usedWith, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemUsed, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(13742, 1); } //Spectral if (UseWith(13736,13752,usedWith,itemUsed)) { if (!player.getInventory().contains(2347)){ player.sm("You need a hammer for make any Spirit Shield."); return; } player.sm("You made a Spectral Spirit Shield."); player.getSkills().addXp(13, 50000); player.getInventory().deleteItem(usedWith, 1); player.getInventory().deleteItem(itemUsed, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(13742, 1); }
its a very simple copy and paste tut

Read full topic
